divs: Sighting DetailsMy family and I had just finished dinner outside (on the patio) and my son and I stayed to watch the sky. We both caught sight of a oval-sphere object overhead in the sky. Which was somewhat low in the sky. Don't know exact feet. At first we thought it was a plane, however, it began to move in sharp turns, circular, up, then down, so we quickly rejected this, since planes don't move in these odd directions. Then it disappeared.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in El Paso
There were no other sightings in El Paso on or around July 4th 2013
Summary: it was a brght white flying oval-sphere shape that appeared in the night sky. It moved in atrange patterns, not in a straight line. Then it disappeared. It lasted 2 minutes.
